backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, shops, OTP entries, and shop updates with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD/query methods for profiles and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file containing the mount point and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App-level routing setup with protected routes, authentication checks, and layout handling using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AppBackButton.ts: Reusable back button component that triggers safe in-app navigation via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/LocationStatusCa: UI card showing location permission status with badges, guidance, error handling, and controls to request or refresh location.
frontend/src/components/MobileAppShell.t: Layout wrapper providing header, logout, routed content, and conditional bottom navigation for shop and customer views.
frontend/src/components/OtpLoginCard.tsx: Card component handling phone input, OTP request/verify flow, and demo OTP display with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/ShopOpenClosedTo: Two-button toggle allowing users to switch a shop’s open or closed state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Provides safe back navigation with fallback routes based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth, login, logout, and stored identities with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationPermission: Manages geolocation permission state, errors, and coordinate retrieval with browser APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpChallenge.ts: Hooks for requesting and verifying OTP codes through the backend actor using mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Stores and manages OTP verification state and phone number in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistLastKnownLo: Persists authenticated users’ latest coordinates to the backend whenever updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating caller user profiles and last known location via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useShop.ts: Provides hooks to get, register, and update the caller’s shop using Internet Identity and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdates.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and create shop updates tied to the caller’s shop, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, dark mode variables, scrollbars, and mobile-safe layout settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App component.
UI page showing welcome text, location status, search/filter controls, categories, and placeholder shop results.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login flow combining Internet Identity authentication with OTP verification before routing to role selection.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectionPage.tsx: Page allowing users to select a role, save their profile, and redirect based on existing or chosen role.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing shop info, registration/edit actions, posting updates, status toggle, and listing active/expired updates.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPostUpdatePage.ts: Form page for creating shop updates with title, description, image upload, expiry selection, validation, and submission.
Shop registration/edit form handling name, category, address, image upload, location permission, validation, and create/update submission.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Utility functions to validate, normalize, and format Indian phone numbers to E.164.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Time utilities for converting dates to backend nanosecond format, computing expiry timestamps, checking active status, and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters across navigation, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, including app summary, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature metadata for the LocalBuzz mobile app.
